actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to provide that grants and contracts may not be made under that title to any entity which provides abortion counseling to minors without the knowledge and consent of their parents or guardians, and for other purposes.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Amends title X (Population Research and Voluntary Family Planning Programs) of the Public Health Service Act to prohibit funding to any entity which provides abortion service or counseling to persons under the age of eighteen without the consent of their parents or guardians.

titles.title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to provide that grants and contracts may not be made under that title to any entity which provides abortion counseling to minors without the knowledge and consent of their parents or guardians, and for other purposes.
